name: Pre-training Safety
description: Safety measures applied during data collection, curation, and model training phases

name: Alignment Methods
description: Techniques for aligning model behavior with human values and intentions

name: Runtime Safety
description: Safety mechanisms that operate during model inference and execution

name: Evaluation & Testing
description: Methods for evaluating, testing, and benchmarking model safety and performance

name: Transparency
description: Documentation, disclosure, and transparency practices for model development and deployment

name: Governance & Oversight
description: Organizational structures, policies, and processes for safety governance and oversight

name: Privacy & Security
description: Protection of personal information and security measures against malicious use
